snippet: A judge approved a $4.8 million settlement between the Justice Department and Morgan Stanley over accusations of price fixing in the electricity market, even as he said that the settlement amount was too low.
abstract: A judge approved a $4.8 million settlement between the Justice Department and Morgan Stanley over accusations of price fixing in the electricity market, even as he said that the settlement amount was too low.

headline.main: Federal Judge Grudgingly Approves Morgan Stanley Price-Fixing Case
headline.print_headline: Morgan Penalty In Price-Fixing Gets Approval
